sentences.english: Happy birthday, Tom, and many happy returns!
sentences.chinese: 生日快乐，汤姆，并祝你福如东海，寿比南山。

sentences.english: Here, I wish you longevity elderly family Rudong sea, pine.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我祝愿爸爸您老人家福如东海水，寿比南山松。

sentences.english: I wish you bounty happiness and longevity of Methuselah.
sentences.chinese: 我祝您福如东海，寿比南山。

sentences.english: Then I wish my grandma don't live as long as the southern mountain pines.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又祝奶奶寿比南山不老松。

definition: may your happiness be as immense as the East Sea (idiom)
may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
good luck and long life
happiness and longevity
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
god of longevity/elderly person whose birthday is being celebrated
give birth to a son soon (propitiatory compliment to the newly-weds)
(myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
77th birthday (honorific, archaic or Japanese term)
the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles (idiom)/one's future prospects are brilliant
We wish you long life and riches! (idiom, conventional greeting)
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
